Admittedly, I'm not as prepared as I would like to have been, but oh 
well.

This week we are evaluating the characters of Soldiers & Elves.

Comments and/or Complaints about these characters are welcome.

* * *

I always felt that Soldier is a mana guzzler when compared to the 
other classes.  Boomerang really wasn't that strong of an attack and 
neither is whirlwind for the amount of mana used.

Elves are pretty cool, but at about level 30, they lose all their big 
weakness.  At level 30, hypothetically an elf could stay in the middle 
of a forest and continously attack opponents without the risk of being 
harmed because of mana production ability outweighs mana lost while 
staying in a forest.
